name: Qwery
description: Qwery is a developer-focused payment infrastructure layer built on Solana. The platform provides APIs, modular SDKs, and an x402-style facilitation engine that enables pay-per-call payments, API monetization, and token-gated access without requiring backend development. Qwery handles transaction orchestration, priority-fee tuning, compute budgeting, and structured logging, allowing developers to integrate on-chain payments in minutes. The $QWERY token functions as a governance and utility-alignment asset used for protocol decisions, access tiers, ecosystem incentives, and long-term infrastructure coordination. Qwery is designed for builders who need a reliable, production-ready payment layer with transparent, consistent development.
